hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that his maternal aunt was divorced, and she wanted to go out to some date palms of hers, but she met a man who told her not to do that. She went to the Messenger of Allah and he said:"Go out and take the harvest of your date palms, for perhaps you will give Zakah or do some good (give voluntary charity)

chapter.eng-name: Widow Going Out During The Day
